ygData.subject: Re: Hermit in SK
ygData.msgSnippet: Unkempt Druids drop, drop loh, just becareful when you go to Rathe mountains, a lot fo them there.
ygData.messageBody:
Unkempt Druids drop, drop loh, just becareful when you go to Rathe mountains, a
lot fo them there.

Synzzz wrote:

> From: "Synzzz" <hannibal@...>
>
> He's solo.
> He has faction hit...some stupid Unkempt Druids....who the hell cares???
> He uses spell sometimes..but more melee..he can hit for 40+ per hit
> sometimes.30+ usually.
> And he's virgin.
>
> p.s i supply you dimensional pocket so you can carry more FS weapons and you
> help me sell can or not? hehe..me can only gate one way leh.
>
> Zanderion
>
> ----- Original Message -----

> Compare

> > dunno why pple willing to pay so much for them.
> >
> > Anyway, heck care man, most impt is to sell the loot at good price, hehe.

> > > check out the hermit living in South Karana. He's dropped FS Long sword,

> > > Short sword,
> > > FS 2 handed Sword before. They're expensive at npcs right if u try to
> buy

> > > them to PCs but i think those damned ppl nowadays all twinked..who even

> > > i can find good low lvl chars to sell to in maybe more newbie
> > > territory..i'll just sell to NPC loh..no choice.
> > > Any ideas? Need cash as always...sigh... BTW..that hermit is lvl 20 FYI.
